extendedInfo.description: This is a license for Ultimate To-Do List, which allows you to use the app beyond the 14 day trial.  Install this AFTER installing the free trial app.This license is for the smartphone edition.  We also have a separate tablet edition for devices with large screens.A to-do list and notebook for power users, which syncs with Toodledo and Google Tasks / gTasks.ORGANIZE:- Organize tasks by folder, location, context, tags, goal, star, and subtasks.- Supports complex repeating patterns (for example: every Tuesday and Thursday).- Track both estimated and actual length of tasks.  Includes a built-in timer.- Organize your notes into folders.- 2 home screen widgets: a task list (in multiple sizes), and a new task buttonSYNCHRONIZE:- Synchronizes with Toodledo.com and Google Tasks / gTasks, allowing access from both your desktop computer and handset.  Supports all features supported by Toodledo and Google.- Supports multiple accounts.- Automatic synchronization, including instant upload of changes on your phone to Toodledo and Google.- Supports subtasks without a paid Toodledo Pro account. (Subtask syncing requires a Toodledo Pro or Google account.)PRIORITIZE:- Includes 5 priority levels and a task status field (active, planning, waiting, etc.).- Option to set a time based and/or location based reminder (proximity alert) for a task.  When linking a task with a location, a location alarm will occur when you reach that location.- Optional nagging alarms remind you again if you don't hear the sound or feel the vibration.- Custom vibrate patterns, sounds, and light colors allow you to distinguish a task alarm from other alarms.- Snooze alarms until later if you can't do the task right away.CUSTOMIZE:- Filter and search on any task field.- Sort by up to 3 levels, on any task field.- Configurable display allows you to see the exact information you are interested in.- Save your filter, sort, and display options into custom views for quick access later.- Customizable interface: Turn off the features you don't want to keep things simple.- Choice of light or dark theme.

reviews.title: Best app for Toodledo  & GTD integration
reviews.comment: Have tried all ios and Android apps that sync with Toodledo and this does the best job of them all.  Great options, clean layout and works perfectly with a GTD setup.  Particularly like the ability to create saved searches.
reviews.author: wj lynch

reviews.title: Fantastic App
reviews.comment: For me this app is a lifesaver! It\'s also well thought-out, easy to use and now has a scrollable wideget for my ICS phone brilliant!!  Suggestion for new feature: Autocomplete when entering tasks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good 4 Phones & smaller Tablets
reviews.comment: This is the best PDA app for Android-type Phones, & the smaller (7\" to 8\") Tablets. Samsung Galaxy Note i717, Android  ICS 4.0.4. Toshiba Excite 7.7, Android JB 4.1.1.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: The best to do app and i\'ve used them all. Lots of features to still learn but I don\'t need to know them all to start getting the benefits. Highly recommend this purchase! Good job!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: This to do list program is the bomb.  It works.  You can even trick Google calendar to list your tasks on it even the repeating tasks. Perfect.   It can only get better.
reviews.author: Michael Weaver

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: There are several task apps that are excellent and I have used th all. This app is fantastic and now my default app for managing my todo list!
reviews.author: Kevin O\'Malley

reviews.title: Best To Do App
reviews.comment: This is the only To-Do list that I\'ve EVER stuck with. I tweaked it to work with Michael Linenberger\'s \"Master Your Workday Now\" system. See his YouTube video: \"Creat a to-do list that really works!\" -------------- I set three filters in \"My Views\
No reviews given!

reviews.title: Very good app - Outstanding Customer Service
reviews.comment: Been using the app almost a year now and I really like it. Does what it is supposed to do in allowing me to  efficiently sync tasks between my phone and Toodledo. What I think really sets this apart from the rest is the customer service. I recently found that I needed to move the app registration from one gmail account to another, and while Google doesn\'t offer a way to do this, David from Custom Solutions went out of his way to help me accomplish this. Very prompt and professional response to my email. This alone justifies the purchase price of the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app so far...
reviews.comment: It has almost anything you could want or need. But if you want it kept simple, or to wait and set up features you want to use in the future, you can quickly pick out what you do and don\'t want to use, and change it easily at any time. I love being able to customize the features I use as my needs change.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Reminder feature ineffective. Slow task entry.
reviews.comment: Low rating due to the following: 1. After editing the reminder and due date on an uncompleted task, the reminder does not display again. [must have]  2. Should be able to have a default reminder field with date and time that is in relation to the due date field rather than having to enter a separate Due Time and then having to click on Reminder to indicate when it should occur (e.g. one min before). [should have]  3. While the app has many fields that can be tweaked, it is very slow to enter a simple task, put in a reminder and add notes. All of this requires multiple fields to be pressed, rather than an entry with a default reminder time and the ability to enter notes without clicking \"edit.\

reviews.title: Lots of functionality, but frustrating at times
reviews.comment: This todo app has lots of functionality and excellent integration with Toodledo but it\'s sometimes a bit frustrating.  First off, when adding new tasks the app doesn\'t select sensible defaults - for example, in a view filtered by a given tag, if I add a new task I\'d expect the tag to be defaulted to the tag I was viewing at the time, but it\'s not.  If I forget to add the tag at task creation then, when I get back to the list (filtered by that tag) the new task isn\'t there and I have to go to other screens (recently added tasks) to find it and add the tag.  And this is probably my main criticism of this app - more thought needs to go into the user interface, both in terms of presentation (not the slickest looking app) and ergonomic issues like the one above.  The final straw for me was when the developer released a tablet version and asked that I pay again (for what effectively is a pretty minor update to the user interface).  So I switched to 2do...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app.
reviews.comment: I have used this app for some time now. However, i just uninstalled in favor of DGT GTD. I paid for this one with no regrets, but i find the other one to be much easier to use. This one has the ability to create stored queries, but I have willing sacrificed that feature. It may be a matter of personal preference, but both are great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: OUTSTANDING!!!
reviews.comment: This app is so GREAT!!! I\'ve tried many of them and this one is the BEST! I was having problems with my phone and just received a new handset. I thought I had lost all of the information I had on this app. I had so many upcoming appointments and didn\'t know where to start to get them back because I couldn\'t remember them all. Plus the notes that I took that I knew that I\'d never get back again. Well, I downloaded the app and it was blank. But after a few minutes I saw that I had also purchased the license so I dowwnloaded that and I opened it up and all of my information was still there. I am so happy!  I\'ve never had a problem with this app at all. It\'s feature rich and user friendly.You use only the features you want to use. If you need to keep track of your life, get this app!!! The only improvement would be to add an audible reminder. BUT I LOVE THIS APP EVEN WITHOUT IT! I\'d give it ten stars if I could.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: it\'s still the best
reviews.comment: ...and it could have been even better (IMHO) if there were options for (multiple) attachments and multiple contacts, and to choose a location (for the reminder) with a tap on a map (this way one knows for sure that it\'s the right location and it should be faster then the method used now).Also, aesthetically it falls behind the competition (but I don\'t really care that much about it\'s aesthetics at this point(because it is doing it\'s job right!))...anyway, it\'s at least a few stars ahead of the others(IMO)!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I dig it
reviews.comment: I don\'t think it\'s worth $5 but it\'s better than the other ones i\'ve used. No issues so far, i dig the layout. It\'s not as convenient as it could be, a few too many clicks needed for some things, but not bad.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Best gtd app I\'ve tried
reviews.author: David Kus\303\241k

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Really helpful
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great. I sync with Tooledo.
reviews.author: Troy Navin

reviews.title: Get it done
reviews.comment: Best to do app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.comment: Works great with Toodledo, syncs everything I need including Notebook. Thanks!
reviews.author: Robert Bendett
